detaileddescription.para: This is connected to the logger. Can be used to redirect logs to any other log

A copy of the command line arguments that start with --. First LLVMFuzzerInitialize() is called, which saves the arguments to g_args. Later, depending on the fuzz test, G_TEST_COMMAND_LINE_ARGUMENTS() may be called by BasicTestingSetup constructor to fetch those arguments and store them in BasicTestingSetup::m_node::args.
